DOC.criteria: 1 . Singleton viable pregnancy . 2 . Gestational age least 36 complete week calculate LMP . 3 . Non scar uterus . 1 . Multiple fetal pregnancy . 2 . Intrauterine fetal death . 3 . Known congenital fetal anomaly . 4 . Presence uterine adnexal gross pathology . 5 . Presence medical disorder e.g . Diabetes mellitus & hypertension .
